page.title: 17FARMING
page.content: Farming life is different now.There is machinery instead of sythes.There is also a mowing machine. It's really the same with milking parlours but now there are machines instead of milking by hand.They didn't have cubicles it was just an open house.Herring bone parlours are bigger than ordinary parlours because you can have a 5x10.That means you can have 5 cows milking and the other 5 waiting. Instead of the churns there is a tanker that moves all the milk. With sheep you can't shear them very well because they kick.They used to be cut by clippers but now they use a special machine.The fleeces are tied up and sent away.
